text: Va (ej musalmonon), dasnom madihed, ʙuthoero ki musrikon meparastand, zero ki dar ʙaroʙari sumo onho ham Allohro az rui zulm va nodoni dasnom xohand kard. Cunki onon qavmi cohiland hamcunon ki amali ʙadasonro ʙarojason zinnat dodem. Incunin amali har qavmero dar pesi casmason orostaem. Pas ʙozgasti onho ʙa sui Parvardigorason ast va U hamaro az korhoe, ki kardaand, ogoh mesozad
